articles.title: Unusual Leap in Gas Prices Puts $3 a Gallon in Sight - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Analysts expect crowded highways and diminished stockpiles to lift gas prices into the summer driving season
articles.content:
The prospect of summer drivers crowding U.S. highways is powering steep gains in the price of gasoline, a sign of economic recovery and a boon for the pandemic-ravaged energy industry.

articles.title: Robinhood files confidentially for IPO despite disastrous start to 2021 - CNN
